title: New: Maria Kelly – Hollow
content:
There’s definitely something in the Irish water at the moment, with the Emerald Isle producing a substantial number of fantastic songwriters over the course of the past couple of years.

Drawing inspiration from the likes of Lisa Hannigan and Regina Spektor, Maria Kelly’s intimate, heartfelt songwriting really hits home on latest single Hollow. Self-arranged, it’s a deeply moving, tender listen, and one of this years most beautiful moments. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
